intro_subtitle_line_1: Once upon a time in the kingdom of Sphereland,
intro_subtitle_line_3: there lived an elderly king who once ruled with bravery.
intro_subtitle_line_4: His deeds, full of valor and gallantry, were remembered throughout his domains.
intro_subtitle_line_5: But the years passed, and King Pool was now an old man who could only recall his past glory.
intro_subtitle_line_6: But everything was about to change.
intro_subtitle_line_7: Visir Ovaline, his most loyal advisor, suspected that the king was no longer able to hold the crown or his government.
intro_subtitle_line_8: Above all, his desire was to rule and maintain order in Sphereland.
intro_subtitle_line_9: As the monarch weakened and Ovaline schemed to gain power,
intro_subtitle_line_10: the heiress princess Eight enjoyed the comforts of the court, unconcerned with everything and unable to take command should King Pool leave his post.
intro_subtitle_line_12: Ovaline, in the absence of opposition and seeing that the coronation was approaching,
intro_subtitle_line_13: gathered his fiercest men to depose the decrepit king and forcefully take the legendary crown of Nike.
intro_subtitle_line_14: Eight, frightened and confused, fled to escape the evil visir.
intro_subtitle_line_15: Feeling cornered, she had no choice but to make her way through the castle's stinking sewers.
text_comic: ONCE UPON A TIME, IN THE KINGDOM OF SPHERELAND...
instructions:
Short jump:
Press and release


Long jump:
Press, hold, and release


Carambola Impact:
After a long jump, press Trigger R
lore_01_01:
I can't believe what happened. I must escape!

I never imagined such a three-cushion trick from Ovalain...

I was so comfortably lying around... and look at me now!
lore_01_02:
How did I end up like this?

A princess like me, rolling through this pigsty without a servant to help, fleeing from a betrayal no one saw coming.
lore_01_03:
This place... I never imagined that the foundations of our kingdom hid so much grime!

What other surprises lie beneath the surface of Sphereland?
lore_01_04:
I don't know what's worse, the rebellion or having to roll through here, maybe I escaped from one mess just to fall into another.

But now I have no choice but to keep running.
lore_01_05:
There's no time for whining, it won't help now.

I must gather courage to move forward!

And once I'm safe, then I can think. And hopefully, take a bath!
userhelp_01_01:
I think I can break that board with that technique.

How was it?... I remember I had to make a big jump and at the peak perform the Carambola Impact.

I should've paid more attention to my instructors...
userhelp_01_02:
Who puts spikes at the bottom of that nasty pit?

When I get out of this, the royal architect will hear from me...

Maybe I can use this box to get across...
userhelp_01_03:
Another of those filthy rubber mice, and this time on top of what looks like a wooden seesaw.

Better knock it out with a good blow to the head if I want to cross that stinking pool of water.
lore_02_01:
What I wouldn't give for a juice right now... Wake up, Eight!

While others prepared, I lived the good life, ignoring my father's advice.

How many times did I choose comfort over duty?
lore_02_02:
This is the first time I'm facing danger like this, all by myself.

Maybe... maybe there's more in me than I thought.

(And if I keep telling myself this, maybe I'll even believe it).
lore_02_03:
I don't see how advancing through a stinking sewer could help me.

But I can't turn back now. Perhaps all I can do is move forward, into the unknown.
userhelp_02_01:
Gross! There's a beetle hanging from the ceiling.

Just what I needed, for that bug to fall on me.

But if I approach carefully, maybe I can climb up to that high area.
userhelp_02_02:
With so many rats down here, there's no way to move forward.

Heh, maybe I can use those fools to get higher by jumping on them.
